page.description: Create a WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::Group object. This is for internal use only. Use a WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::Domain object to get a group

section.example: 'The follow line assumes that the machine is joined to an Active Directory domain and is allow to query Active Directory. dim domain as WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::Domain = new WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::Domain() if domain.CallResult.Success then ?"The domain name is " + domain.Name + "<br/>" else ?"There was an error connecting to an Active Directory domain: " + domain.CallResult.Text + "<br/>" end if
